solution_line_template: For the 2nd kilometer, the donation will be ${first_km_donation} * {multiplier} = $<<{first_km_donation}*{multiplier}={second_km_donation}>>{second_km_donation}.
For the 3rd kilometer, the donation will be ${second_km_donation} * {multiplier} = $<<{second_km_donation}*{multiplier}={third_km_donation}>>{third_km_donation}.
For the 4th kilometer, the donation will be ${third_km_donation} * {multiplier} = $<<{third_km_donation}*{multiplier}={fourth_km_donation}>>{fourth_km_donation}.
For the final kilometer, the donation will be ${fourth_km_donation} * {multiplier} = $<<{fourth_km_donation}*{multiplier}={fifth_km_donation}>>{fifth_km_donation}.

For the entire race the donation will be ${first_km_donation} + ${second_km_donation} + ${third_km_donation} + ${fourth_km_donation} + ${fifth_km_donation} = $<<{first_km_donation}+{second_km_donation}+{third_km_donation}+{fourth_km_donation}+{fifth_km_donation}={total_donation}>>{total_donation}.
